alert.note: Alert for Stephens (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 08 at 10:11AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Stephens County through 1045 AM CST... At 1011 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ibex, or 11 miles west of Breckenridge, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Breckenridge, Hubbard Creek Reservoir, Lake Daniel, Eolian and Us- 180 Near The Shackelford-Stephens County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
